subject: Basketball
College Athletics
Colleges and Universities
lead_paragraph: Grunwald, now the athletic director at McMaster University, was pushed out of his job in New York despite two straight winning seasons and a run to the 2013 Eastern Conference semifinals.
snippet: Grunwald, now the athletic director at McMaster University, was pushed out of his job in New York despite two straight winning seasons and a run to the 2013 Eastern Conference semifinals.
